content:
DataGridAutomationPeer Class

Definition

Exposes DataGrid types to UI Automation.

In this Article

public sealed class DataGridAutomationPeer : System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableProvider

Explicit Interface Implementations

IGridProvider.ColumnCount

Gets the total number of columns in a grid.

int System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider.ColumnCount { get; }
Returns
Int32

The total number of columns in a grid.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IGridProvider interface.

Retrieves the UI Automation provider for the specified cell.

column

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IGridProvider interface.

ISelectionProvider.CanSelectMultiple

Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.

bool System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider.CanSelectMultiple { get; }

Boolean

true if multiple selection is allowed; otherwise false.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionProvider interface.

ISelectionProvider.IsSelectionRequired

Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.

Returns
Boolean

false in all cases.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionProvider interface.
